 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָרוֺד‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==wild ass== (probably Aramaic loanword ( = Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּרֶא‎</span>), [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרָדָא‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲרוֺדָא‎</span> Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; Mandean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אראדא‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Hom|Hom]]<sup> NS 133</sup>); **\*\***perhaps √ <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [***run away***?], &lt; √ <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***schreien*** [DHM zu Asma'ï, Farq p.43] das auch vom Wildesel vorkommt Amra alqais 4. 21, Zuhair 1. 25.' — Nö<sup>Fünf Mo\`all, ii. 75 (SB Wlender Akkadian cxlii)</sup>. — [[Job.39.5|Job 39:5]].
